name: Car Rush - Traffic Racing
description:
Car Rush - Traffic Racing is one of the best racing games. Have fun driving cars and Bus while you speed up to the limit.
Take your car and race against everyone in 4 different game modes… day or night or rainy! You can also upgrade your ride with your hard earned money.
What are you waiting for? Download Traffic Racing now!

Features:

- 4 games modes.
- Basic customization through paint and wheels
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Lots of cars.
- Great 3D graphics.
- Awesome music.
- Endless fun!
- Two-way Mode
- Bomb Mode

Tips:

- The faster you drive the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and coins
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and coins
